note.p: Career: Served with the HEIC (for 6 years); Minister Plenipotentiary ad interim, Persia (1814-1815); Third Commissioner in William Pitt's embassy to China (1816); published account of journey to China (1817); MP for Boston, Lincolnshire (1820-1821); Commissioner of Customs (1824-1825); Clerk of the Pells (1825-1834); Commissioner of the Board of Control (1830-1835); Privy Councillor (1832) Ambassador to Persia (1835)
